appetizers.name: Muriyevo Soup
appetizers.description: Spinach, onions, tomatoes and assorted Harambe spices, made with coconut milk
appetizers.label: Vegetarian

appetizers.name: Harambe Salad
appetizers.description: Tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, and lettuce with assorted Harambe spices in the dressing.
appetizers.label: Vegetarian

appetizers.name: Peanut Soup
appetizers.description: Chicken cooked in peanut sauce with Harambe organic spices.

appetizers.name: Dumaskli Soup
appetizers.description: Milk, corn, and assorted Harambe Organic Ethiopian, made with coconut milk.
appetizers.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Shero Wot
vegetarian.description: Ground chickpeas cooked in berbere with onions and seasoned with Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Misir Wot
vegetarian.description: Red split lentils cooked with onions in berbere and Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Tekil Gomen
vegetarian.description: Steamed cabbage and onions seasoned with Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Gomen
vegetarian.description: Spinach boiled in onions and sauteed with garlic and Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Yatekilt Alicha
vegetarian.description: Sauteed carrots, string beans, potatoes, and onions, seasoned with Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

vegetarian.name: Kik Alicha Wot
vegetarian.description: Yellow split lentils cooked with onions in berbere and Harambe organic spices.
vegetarian.label: Vegetarian

beef.name: Kitefo
beef.description: Lean tender beef finely chopped tartar and mixed with mitmita cardamom and Ethiopian butter. Served raw or slightly cooked with your choice of spinach or Ateb (Ethiopian Cottage Cheese) and choice of injera or rice.

beef.name: Kitefo and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
beef.description: Lean tender beef finely chopped tartar and mixed with mitmita cardamom and Ethiopian butter. Served raw or slightly cooked with your choice of spinach or Ateb (Ethiopian Cottage Cheese) and choice of injera or rice.
beef.image: Kitefo and three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes.png

beef.name: Zilzil Tibs
beef.description: Strips of tender beef sauteed with onions, exotic herbs, and berbere. Served with salad and choice of injera or rice.

beef.name: Awaze Tibs
beef.description: Beef chunks sauteed in butter, seasoned with onions, green peppers, and organic Ethiopian spices, and served with Harambe salad and choice of injera or rice.

beef.name: Awaze Tibs and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
beef.description: Awaze tibs with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination and injera or rice.

beef.name: Gored Gored
beef.description: Chucked cubed beef mixed with homemade awaze sauce and herbal butter with your choice of injera or rice.

beef.name: Alicha Wot
beef.description: Diced lean meat simmered with onions, ginger, garlic, and assorted Harambe organic spices. Served with salad and choice of injera or rice.

beef.name: Alicha Wot and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
beef.description: Alatcha Wot with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination and injera or rice.

chicken.name: Doro Wot
chicken.description: Chicken stew with hard-boiled eggs, chicken thigh, leg, and egg, cooked with onions in rich berbere sauce. Very tasty and served with Ayeb (Ethiopian Cottage Cheese) and Injera or rice.

chicken.name: Doro Wot and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
chicken.description: Doro wot with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination.

chicken.name: Doro Tibs
chicken.description: Chicken cubes sauteed with onions, garlic, spices, and mixed vegetables. Served with salad and choice of injera or rice.

chicken.name: Doro Tibs and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
chicken.description: Doro tibs with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination.
chicken.image: Doro Tibs with three kinds of veggies.png

lamb.name: Yebeg Tibs
lamb.description: Lamb cubes pan fried in jalapenos, onions, and rosemary, served with Harambe salad.

lamb.name: Yebeg Tibs with Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
lamb.description: Yebeg tibs with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination.

lamb.name: Yebeg Wot
lamb.description: Lamb simmered in berbere sauce, seasoned with organic Harambe spices, and served with salad.
lamb.image: Yebeg Wot with three kinds veggies.png

lamb.name: Yebeg Wot with Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
lamb.description: Yebeg Wot with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination.
lamb.image: Yebeg Wot with three kinds veggies.png

combinationPlatters.name: Veggie Lovers Combination
combinationPlatters.description: Assorted Harambe vegetarian dishes with Harambe salad.
combinationPlatters.label: Vegetarian

combinationPlatters.name: Chef's Choice Combination
combinationPlatters.description: Yebeg Wot, Doro Wot, and Alicha Wot with Harambe assorted vegetarian dishes from the menu.

fish.name: Ye Assa Tibs
fish.description: Fish of the day pan fried and delicately seasoned with Ethiopian herbs and spices, served with a side salad and choice of injera or rice.

fish.name: Ye Assa Tibs and Three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes
fish.description: Ye assa tibs with chef's choice of three items from the standard vegetable combination.
fish.image: Ye Assa Tibs and three Kinds of Vegetable Dishes.png

injera.name: Injera
injera.description: For thousands of years, Ethiopians have made traditional Ethiopian bread called Injera when eating and Ethiopian meal. Injera serves both as your platter and utensil. Standard Injera Included with your meal. Gluten free Injera are $3.00 each
